import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import bootstrap from 'react-bootstrap' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Footer from '../components/footer'; import Navbar from '../components/navbar'; import axios from "axios"; function CourseDetail({match}) { const [post, setPost] = useState({}) const id = match.params.id useEffect(() => { axios({ method: "GET", url: `http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/blog/${id}/` }).then(response => { setPost(response.data) }) }, [id]); { return (

{post.name}
